Cloud of Darkness.name: Cloud of Darkness
Cloud of Darkness.sourceRef: Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms
Cloud of Darkness.flavor: A shroud of blackness descends around you, hiding you from sight.
keywords: Close burst 1  Effect: The burst creates a cloud of darkness that remains in place until the end of your next turn. The cloud blocks line of sight, squares within it are totally obscured, and creatures entirely within it are blinded until they exit. You are immune to these effects.
Cloud of Darkness.effect: The burst creates a cloud of darkness that remains in place until the end of your next turn. The cloud blocks line of sight, squares within it are totally obscured, and creatures entirely within it are blinded until they exit. You are immune to these effects.

Glimmering Forms.name: Glimmering Forms
Glimmering Forms.flavor: Bright lights blossom into existence. The way they flicker makes them appear to be burning torches.
Glimmering Forms.effect: You cause four glowing forms to appear in unoccupied squares in the burst. The forms can appear as torches, lanterns, glowing spheres, or vaguely humanoid shapes. Each form emits dim light to a range of 2 squares. The forms last until the end of your next turn. They also vanish if you use this power again.
Glimmering Forms.sustainMinor: The forms persist until the end of your next turn, and you can move two of them up to 5 squares apiece.

Levitation.name: Levitation
Levitation.flavor: Calling on the magic inherent in your bloodline, you rise into the air as lightly as a feather on the wind.
keywords: Personal   Effect: You can fly up to 4 squares vertically and 1 square horizontally, and hover there until the end of your next turn. You have an altitude limit of 4, but if some effect causes you to exceed this limit, you immediately descend to 4 squares above the ground after resolving the effect. When this flight ends, you descend to the ground, taking no falling damage.
Levitation.effect: You can fly up to 4 squares vertically and 1 square horizontally, and hover there until the end of your next turn. You have an altitude limit of 4, but if some effect causes you to exceed this limit, you immediately descend to 4 squares above the ground after resolving the effect. When this flight ends, you descend to the ground, taking no falling damage.

Continuous Levitation.name: Continuous Levitation
Continuous Levitation.flavor: With focused concentration, you keep yourself aloft to gain the advantage over your foes.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: You use levitation.  Effect: You gain the ability to sustain levitation. This ability lasts until the end of the encounter.  Sustain Move: Levitation persists until the end of your next turn, and you can move up to 3 squares vertically or 1 square horizontally.
Continuous Levitation.effect: You gain the ability to sustain levitation. This ability lasts until the end of the encounter.
Continuous Levitation.sustainMove: Levitation persists until the end of your next turn, and you can move up to 3 squares vertically or 1 square horizontally.

Vanish from View.name: Vanish from View
Vanish from View.flavor: You use a moment where your enemy can’t fully see you to avoid an attack and gain the upper hand.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: You are hit by a melee or a ranged attack while you have cover or concealment from the attacker.  Effect: You make a Stealth check. If your result exceeds the attack roll, the attack misses you, and you gain combat advantage against the attacker until the end of your next turn.
Vanish from View.trigger: You are hit by a melee or a ranged attack while you have cover or concealment from the attacker.
Vanish from View.effect: You make a Stealth check. If your result exceeds the attack roll, the attack misses you, and you gain combat advantage against the attacker until the end of your next turn.

Quell Magic.name: Quell Magic
Quell Magic.flavor: You snuff out the magic you see before you as easily as a child blows out candles.
keywords: Area burst 2 within 10 squares  Target: Each conjuration and zone in the burst  Attack: Intelligence + 4 or Charisma + 4 vs. the Will of the creator of the conjuration or the zone  Hit: The target is destroyed. All its effects end, including those that normally last until a target saves.
Quell Magic.target: Each conjuration and zone in the burst
Quell Magic.attack: Intelligence + 4 or Charisma + 4 vs. the Will of the creator of the conjuration or the zone
Quell Magic.onHit: The target is destroyed. All its effects end, including those that normally last until a target saves.

Dark Doorway.name: Dark Doorway
Dark Doorway.flavor: You see your moment and seize a pathway of magic that pulls you through shadow to arrive elsewhere.
Dark Doorway.requirement: You must be hidden from each enemy within 10 squares of you.
Dark Doorway.effect: You teleport up to 10 squares to a square providing any degree of cover or concealment. You can make a Stealth check to remain hidden when you arrive, ignoring the normal -5 penalty to the check for movement.

Darkfire.name: Darkfire
Darkfire.sourceRef: Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms
Darkfire.flavor: A flickering halo of purple light surrounds the target, making it easier to hit.
keywords: Ranged 10  Target: One creature  Attack: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Reflex. You gain a +4 bonus to the attack roll.
Darkfire.attack:
Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Reflex. You gain a +4 bonus to the attack roll.
Level 11: The bonus increases to +6.
Level 21: The bonus increases to +8.
Darkfire.onHit: Until the end of your next turn, all attacks against the target have combat advantage, and the target cannot benefit from invisibility or concealment.
Darkfire.special: When you create your character, choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability score you use when making attack rolls with this power. This choice remains throughout your character’s life and does not change the power’s other effects.
